shinyuikit
  • Reference

    shinyuikit

    UIkit for Shiny.

    Installation

    # install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_git("https://gitlab.com/dickoa/shinyuikit")

    Example

    library(shiny)

shinyApp(
  ui = ukPage(
  ),
  server = function(input, output) { }
)
